factText: Evacuation orders for the Sycamore Creek neighborhood and the Lake Elsinore community of Riverside also were lifted Sunday, allowing residents to go home. Tweets by PE_CraigShultz  Saturday evening, the evacuation order was lifted for the Machado neighborhood in Lake Elsinore, and voluntary evacuations were no longer in place for the Shoreline community. Retweeted Cleveland NF (@ClevelandNF): #Holyfire Mandatory evacuation for the Machado community has been lifted.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText: Firefighters get a handle on the Holy fire, containment jumps to 51%. UPDATE: The Holy Wildfire in California is now up to 29 percent containment. As of Saturday morning California's Holy Fire was 29 percent contained. Firefighters made progress on the Holy Fire, with containment rising from 10 to 29 percent. #HolyFire [update] off Holy Jim Canyon Rd, west of N. Main Divide (Orange County) is now 22,714 acres and 41% contained.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_What percentage of the wildfire is contained in {event}?

factText: Evacuations remained in effect in Holy Jim, Trabuco Canyon recreation residence tracts, Blue Jay and Falcon Campgrounds, El Cariso Village, Rancho Capistrano and Glen Eden Canyon, authorities said. Flames from the #HolyFire were advancing quickly into Lake Elsinore, threatening more homes and prompting new evacuations. The fire burned through the area forcing thousands in neighborhoods to be evacuated.
Air quality officials warned that unhealthy conditions remained in some areas of Southern California.
Fire has destroyed 14 structures and damaged 10, according to an ongoing assessment.

A 22,158-acre wildfire allegedly set by an arsonist has forced the evacuation of more than 7,400 homes and destroyed about a dozen buildings as it rampaged through dry brush and into a Riverside Count

Animal Friends of the Valleys #AFV and Riverside County San Jacinto Animal Campus #SJAC have done an amazing job helping the pets both domestic and livestock evacuated as a result of the #HolyFire. @pjdohertygis @RBerry3664 For #HolyFire #RiversideCounty Animal Services has been facilitating evacuations of anima… https://t.co/5geBLv8Ub0
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_How are animals and livestock being evacuated from {event}?

factText: State of emergency declared in two more California counties battling fires.
Significant Power Outage: The City of Riverside Fire and Pubic Utilities are working a significant issue in the area near Norte Vista High School for several power lines down, transformers exploding;

The Holy Fire was one of nearly 20 blazes across California, which is seeing earlier, longer and more destructive wildfire seasons because of drought, warmer weather attributed to climate change and h. Firefighters had feared that hot, dry winds on the fire's northeastern flank would endanger homes north of Lake Elsinore and west of Interstate 15.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_What weather conditions are affecting the wildfire's spread?

factText: #HolyFire reaches more than 22,000 acres, 35 percent containment as firefight nears one week, officials say https://t.co/WSOMZnkpma. Meanwhile, CAL FIRE says, record-setting northern California fire is 60 percent contained. While many California residents are working to save their homes from the wildfires that have erupted across the state, many now find they must also work to save their health, endangered by the toxic s
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_What measures are in place to prevent further wildfire outbreaks?

factText: Cleveland NF The #HolyFire is currently @ 22,714 acres with 41% containment. 🔥 fighters are continuing to improve fire lines & suppress where possible. FF. @nbcsandiego THANK YOU to all the firefighters battling the raging #HolyFire, and other wildfires burning across #California. Good morning, The #HolyFire is currently @ 22,714 acres with 41% containment. 🔥 fighters are continuing to improve fire lines & suppress where possible. #rsm #missionviejo #orangecounty
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_How many firefighters are currently battling the wildfire?

factText: DePalma Road – Campbell Ranch Road has been opened. Glen Eden Road is closed at DePalma Road. Mandatory evacuations… https://t.co/UswSqTNrLV
Regarding the power outage and reports of fire from last night.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_Are there any power outages due to the wildfire?

factText: CALIFORNIA FIRE: The "Holy Fire" is 29 percent contained. More: https://wink.news/2Ottd3W:=:https://www.winknews.com/2018/08/12/crews-make-progress-battling-southern-california-wildfire/
WILDFIRE HIGHWAY CLOSURES #CarrFire #FergusonFire #HolyFire #DonnellFire #MendocinoComplex
Deputies from Mission Viejo have been working tirelessly with our community partners to fight this fire.

The southern California fires have doubled in size since Wednesday night and fire crews have relentlessly battled to get control of the blaze. CALIFORNIA’S Holy Fire exploded to more than 22,…. Aided by slightly cooler temperatures, firefighters are continuing to make progress as they work to subdue a wildfire that has burned across more than 35 square miles (91 kilometers) of..
Serious situation happening - CALIFORNIA’S Holy Fire exploded to more than 22,714 acres on Sunday as firefighters worked to keep the blaze away from homes in Riverside County’s Lake Elsinore area.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_general_What news outlets are reporting on {event} and what are they saying?

factText: God Shows His Mercy in the Most Amazing Ways:  The California Holy Fire exploded to more than 19,100 acres as it continued to move near homes in the Lake Elsinore area. Saturday #HolyFire update:   -21,473 acres burned and 29% contained as of midday Saturday, per @ClevelandNF.  -Cont… https://t.co/HtSiNV2neB. The Holy Fire, named for Holy Jim Canyon, where it began Monday - grew to nearly 33 square miles (85 square kilometre) by Saturday morning
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_How many acres have burned due to {event}?

factText: In this photo, firefighters rest at the scene of the #HolyFire, which has grown thousands of acres in a matter of days and forced thousands to evacuate their homes. While the Holy Fire has charred more than 21,000 acres of land, some evacuations were lifted Saturday. EVENING UPDATE - SATURDAY, AUGUST 11 @ 5 p.m. Things are still going in the right direction for the Holy Fire near Lake Elsinore, with many of the evacuations in the area now lifted.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_general_What actions are being taken by law enforcement to ensure safety during {event}?

factText: SMOKE ADVISORY UPDATE (Sun., Aug. 12th thru Mon. morning): #HolyFire smoke is impacting our air quality. Air qualit… https://t.co/y7hsMgfipD. SMOKE ADVISORY UPDATE (Sunday, August 12th): #HolyFire within the Cleveland National Forest (@ClevelandNF) is impacting our air quality.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-003_Wildfire_What are the air quality conditions due to smoke from {event}?

factText: The Holy Fire in California continues to burn with more than 21,000 people under mandatory evacuations. #HolyFire morning update:  - The #wildfire has burned 22,174 acres & is 41% contained. - Evacuations have been lift… https://t.co/YJbwuq5pzk. The 22,000-acre wildfire is 41-percent contained, and thousands of previously evacuated residents have been allowed to return home.
A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING has been issued for south-central Somerset County (orange box) until 7:15pm Sunday.

Evacuation orders for the Sycamore Creek neighborhood and the Lake Elsinore community of Riverside also were lifted Sunday, allowing residents to go home. Tweets by PE_CraigShultz  Saturday evening, the evacuation order was lifted for the Machado neighborhood in Lake Elsinore, and voluntary evacuations were no longer in place for the Shoreline community. Retweeted Cleveland NF (@ClevelandNF): #Holyfire Mandatory evacuation for the Machado community has been lifted.
